entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
